descript.supplinf: Feature class [[OBJECT]] is part of [[DB NAME]], a composite dataset that conforms to [[GEMS]]. [[FEATURE DATASET]]. This file was partially automated by the use of [[SCRIPT]].

attracc.attraccr: Confidence that a feature exists and confidence that a feature is correctly identified are described in per-feature attributes ExistenceConfidence and IdentityConfidence.

horizpa.horizpar: Estimated accuracy of horizontal location is given on a per-feature basis by attribute LocationConfidenceMeters. Values are expected to be correct within a factor of 2. A LocationConfidenceMeters value of -9 or -9999 indicates that no value has been assigned.

enttyp.enttypd: Attribute definitions for GeMS-defined fields found in any table
enttyp.enttypds: GeMS (Geologic Map Schema) - a standard format for the digital publication of geologic maps, available at http://ngmdb.usgs.gov/Info/standards/GeMS/

attr.attrdef: Primary key for this table.
attr.attrdefs: GeMS (Geologic Map Schema) - a standard format for the digital publication of geologic maps, available at http://ngmdb.usgs.gov/Info/standards/GeMS/

attrdomv.udom: Arbitrary string. Values should be unique within this database.

attr.attrdef: Museum number, lab number, split number, etc.
attr.attrdefs: GeMS (Geologic Map Schema) - a standard format for the digital publication of geologic maps, available at http://ngmdb.usgs.gov/Info/standards/GeMS/

attr.attrdef: Source of analytical data for this sample. Foreign key to DataSources table.
attr.attrdefs: GeMS (Geologic Map Schema) - a standard format for the digital publication of geologic maps, available at http://ngmdb.usgs.gov/Info/standards/GeMS/

attr.attrdef: Strike of planar feature or trend of linear feature, as measured in degrees clockwise from geographic North. Use right-hand rule (dip is to right of azimuth direction). Horizontal planar features may have any azimuth.
attr.attrdefs: GeMS (Geologic Map Schema) - a standard format for the digital publication of geologic maps, available at http://ngmdb.usgs.gov/Info/standards/GeMS/

attr.attrdef: Source of data; foreign key to table DataSources.
attr.attrdefs: GeMS (Geologic Map Schema) - a standard format for the digital publication of geologic maps, available at http://ngmdb.usgs.gov/Info/standards/GeMS/

attrdomv.udom: Arbitrary string that identifies a row in DataSources

attr.attrdef: Indicates how confidently existence of this line feature has been determined. Values must be defined in Glossary table.
attr.attrdefs: GeMS (Geologic Map Schema) - a standard format for the digital publication of geologic maps, available at http://ngmdb.usgs.gov/Info/standards/GeMS/

attr.attrdef: Sample ID given at time of collection.
attr.attrdefs: GeMS (Geologic Map Schema) - a standard format for the digital publication of geologic maps, available at http://ngmdb.usgs.gov/Info/standards/GeMS/

attr.attrdef: String that records hierarchical structure. Has form nn-nn-nn, nnn-nnn, or similar. Numeric, left-padded with zeros, delimited with any non-alphanumeric character such as dots, dashes, slashes, etc. Each HierarchyKey fragment of each row MUST be the same length to allow text-based sorting of table entries.
attr.attrdefs: GeMS (Geologic Map Schema) - a standard format for the digital publication of geologic maps, available at http://ngmdb.usgs.gov/Info/standards/GeMS/

attr.attrdef: Indicates how confidently this feature has been identified as a particular Type.
attr.attrdefs: GeMS (Geologic Map Schema) - a standard format for the digital publication of geologic maps, available at http://ngmdb.usgs.gov/Info/standards/GeMS/

attr.attrdef: Dip of planar feature or plunge of linear feature, as measured in degrees down from horizontal. Negative values allowed when specifying vectors (not axes) that point above the horizon, e.g., paleocurrents. Types defined as horizontal (e.g., horizontal bedding) shall have Inclination = 0.
attr.attrdefs: GeMS (Geologic Map Schema) - a standard format for the digital publication of geologic maps, available at http://ngmdb.usgs.gov/Info/standards/GeMS/

attr.attrdef: Indicates whether the line feature is concealed by an overlying map unit.
attr.attrdefs: GeMS (Geologic Map Schema) - a standard format for the digital publication of geologic maps, available at http://ngmdb.usgs.gov/Info/standards/GeMS/

attrdomv.udom: Boolean values, True/False, Yes/No, Y/N, etc.

attr.attrdef: Text, with markup tags if desired, to be used for labeling the feature.
attr.attrdefs: GeMS (Geologic Map Schema) - a standard format for the digital publication of geologic maps, available at http://ngmdb.usgs.gov/Info/standards/GeMS/

attr.attrdef: Estimated half-width in meters of positional uncertainty envelope; position is relative to other features in database.
attr.attrdefs: GeMS (Geologic Map Schema) - a standard format for the digital publication of geologic maps, available at http://ngmdb.usgs.gov/Info/standards/GeMS/

attr.attrdef: Short description of the method of station location; e.g.,'GPS', 'Inspection of USGS 7.5' 2024 US Topo for Cadle Butte, OR', 'highway milepost', etc. Values must be defined in Glossary table.
attr.attrdefs: GeMS (Geologic Map Schema) - a standard format for the digital publication of geologic maps, available at http://ngmdb.usgs.gov/Info/standards/GeMS/

attr.attrdef: Source of location; foreign key to table DataSources.
attr.attrdefs: GeMS (Geologic Map Schema) - a standard format for the digital publication of geologic maps, available at http://ngmdb.usgs.gov/Info/standards/GeMS/

attrdomv.udom: Arbitrary string that identifies a row in DataSources.

attr.attrdef: Short plain-text identifier of the map unit. Foreign key to DescriptionOfMapUnits table.
attr.attrdefs: GeMS (Geologic Map Schema) - a standard format for the digital publication of geologic maps, available at http://ngmdb.usgs.gov/Info/standards/GeMS/

attr.attrdef: Earth-material that was analyzed, e.g., wood, shell, zircon, basalt, whole-rock.
attr.attrdefs: GeMS (Geologic Map Schema) - a standard format for the digital publication of geologic maps, available at http://ngmdb.usgs.gov/Info/standards/GeMS/

attr.attrdef: Additional information specific to a particular feature or table entry.
attr.attrdefs: GeMS (Geologic Map Schema) - a standard format for the digital publication of geologic maps, available at http://ngmdb.usgs.gov/Info/standards/GeMS/

attr.attrdef: Internal feature number.
attr.attrdefs: Esri

attrdomv.udom: Sequential unique whole numbers that are automatically generated.

attr.attrdef: Estimated circular error (in degrees) of this orientation. For planar features, error is of the orientation of the pole to the plane.
attr.attrdefs: GeMS (Geologic Map Schema) - a standard format for the digital publication of geologic maps, available at http://ngmdb.usgs.gov/Info/standards/GeMS/

attr.attrdef: Source of orientation data; foreign key to table DataSources.
attr.attrdefs: GeMS (Geologic Map Schema) - a standard format for the digital publication of geologic maps, available at http://ngmdb.usgs.gov/Info/standards/GeMS/

attrdomv.udom: Arbitrary string that identifies a row in DataSources

attr.attrdef: Denominator of smallest map scale at which this point feature should be plotted on map.
attr.attrdefs: GeMS (Geologic Map Schema) - a standard format for the digital publication of geologic maps, available at http://ngmdb.usgs.gov/Info/standards/GeMS/

attr.attrdef: Feature geometry.
attr.attrdefs: Esri

attr.attrdef: Area of feature in internal units squared.
attr.attrdefs: Esri

attrdomv.udom: Positive real numbers that are automatically generated.

attr.attrdef: Length of feature in internal units.
attr.attrdefs: Esri

attrdomv.udom: Positive real numbers that are automatically generated.

attr.attrdef: Unique identifier of station.
attr.attrdefs: GeMS (Geologic Map Schema) - a standard format for the digital publication of geologic maps, available at http://ngmdb.usgs.gov/Info/standards/GeMS/

attr.attrdef: Identifier or code for the symbol to be used to portray the feature. Definition here should include the name of the style file, symbol set, gallery, etc. that contains the symbol.
attr.attrdefs: GeMS (Geologic Map Schema) - a standard format for the digital publication of geologic maps, available at http://ngmdb.usgs.gov/Info/standards/GeMS/

attr.attrdef: Classifier that specifies what kind of feature is represented by a database element: that a certain line within feature class ContactsAndFaults is a contact, or thrust fault, or water boundary; or that a point in GeochronPoints represents a K-Ar date. Values must be defined in Glossary table.
attr.attrdefs: GeMS (Geologic Map Schema) - a standard format for the digital publication of geologic maps, available at http://ngmdb.usgs.gov/Info/standards/GeMS/

attr.attrdef: Universal Resource Locator (URL) or Document Object Identifier (DOI), identifies a document on the World Wide Web.
attr.attrdefs: GeMS (Geologic Map Schema) - a standard format for the digital publication of geologic maps, available at http://ngmdb.usgs.gov/Info/standards/GeMS/

metainfo.metstdn: FGDC Content Standard for Digital Geospatial Metadata
